content.description: The following question is based on an excerpt of music that may be played two times.
content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the motion between the triads that are heard alternating with the repeated pitches?

choices.label: The triads move by conjunct motion only.
The triads move by disjunct motion only.
The triads move by both conjunct and disjunct motion.
The triads do not move by step or by leap.

content.answer: The triads move by both conjunct and disjunct motion.
